a) Make inference from the following paragraph and answer the following questions: 5 Opera refers to a dramatic art form, originating in Europe, in which the emotional content is conveyed to the audience as much through music, both vocal and instrumental, as it is through the lyrics. By contrast, in musical theater an actor's dramatic performance is primary, and the music plays a lesser role. The drama in opera is presented using the primary elements of theater such as scenery, costumes, and acting. However, the words of the opera, or libretto, are sung rather than spoken. The singers are accompanied by a musical ensemble ranging from a small instrumental ensemble to a full symphonic orchestra.

It is pointed out in the reading that opera ----. i. has developed under the influence of musical theater ii. as a drama sung with the accompaniment of an orchestra iii. is not a high-budget production iv. is often performed in Europe v. is the most complex of all the performing arts
An actor’s performance is less important than music-True/False
A suitable title for the passage would be- i. Libretto ii Opera iii Musical Ensemble

From your reading of the passage what do you infer about the primary elements of theatre. b) Develop an essay on The influence of technology on human communication and 10 relationships with reference to Artificial Intelligence. *** Page 2 of 2 SRN 1st Semester B.
